pullrequest.title: Convert copyright file to follow Debian DEP 5

content.raw: I've update the pull request with all the licenses I've seen in the code. We have a problem since gazebo host code, called [OPCODE](#!/osrf/gazebo-release/pull-request/9/convert-copyright-file-to-follow-debian/diff#Lubuntu/debian/copyrightT209), which does not claim any explicit license nor in the code, nor in the web.
content.html: I've update the pull request with all the licenses I've seen in the code. We have a problem since gazebo host code, called OPCODE, which does not claim any explicit license nor in the code, nor in the web.
